description: This file defines Express.js routes for a notes application, including health check and CRUD operations for notes, with Swagger API documentation annotations.

methods.name: router.get('/')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the root path for health check.

methods.name: router.get('/notes')
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all notes.

methods.name: router.post('/notes')
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new note.

methods.name: router.put('/notes/:id')
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update a note by id.

methods.name: router.delete('/notes/:id')
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to delete a note by id.
